plugins.cameraPermission: Allow EmoGo to access your camera to record video vlogs.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow EmoGo to access your microphone to record video vlogs.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow EmoGo to use your location to track where you record your responses.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow EmoGo to use your location to track where you record your responses.

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to access your microphone to record video vlogs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow EmoGo to use your location to track where you record your responses.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow EmoGo to use your location to track where you record your responses.
